item.title: Farmers and politics threaten to put EU's free-trade deal with South America on ice
item.description: France is creating a last-minute hurdle for a major trade deal between the European Union and the Mercosur bloc

item.title: Iran's rial currency plummets to new low, sparking fears of higher food prices
item.description: Iran’s rial has hit a new record low of over 1.3 million to the U.S. dollar, deepening its collapse amid sanctions and regional tensions
